ygData.subject: Re: New Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What s your smithing skill at? I to use store bought metal sheets, and have had little problems using them (other than trying to make banded with a low
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>
>Hello everyone,
>
>I used some bits made by another smith to try to practice my
>blacksmithing tonight and I failed on all 20 times to advance my
>blacksmithing skill. Also, using store bought metal sheets making
>banded armor, I failed every time to advance my skill.
>
>My question is:
>
>Do you have to make your own components in order for your
>skill to advance or was this just bad luck?
>
>Thanks
>David

What's your smithing skill at? I to use store bought metal sheets, and have
had little problems using them (other than trying to make banded with a low
smithing skill level; I've had less than a 30% success rate and I'm
currently at 43; I've been told to hold off on making banded until around
skill level 80). Also, depending on what your smithing skill level is would
determine what I'd recommend using to advance your smithing further.
